resources.string: Are you sure you want to discard your record?
"For now, premium plan is not available. If you want some custom plan, send us an email at "
Select the language that will be used in the conversations that you want to record. By default, AutoActa will choose the same as the language of this smartphone.
Sign in or create an account
Your summary is on your way. Please, wait a few minutes!
Your PDF is not ready yet!
Your document is not ready yet!

AutoActa is your personal secretary.

It summarizes your conversation, gives you the key points and future tasks talked about, and the complete transcription too.

The report is sent to your email.
Keep in mind that AutoActa uses a generative AI, that means, if the conversation is too short, it can hallucinate.

In consequence, it is recommended that the conversation last at least one minute.
Just press the button and start to talk!
